name: @maplat/ui
description:
Maplat is the cool Historical Map/Illustrated Map Viewer.
It can transform each map coordinates with nonlinear but homeomorphic projection and makes possible that the maps can collaborate with GPS/accurate maps, without distorting original maps.

scripts.build: npm run freeze && npm run less_build && npm run www_build && npm run sw_build && npm run zip_build
scripts.build_packed: npm run freeze && npm run less_build_packed && npm run www_build_packed
scripts.version: npm run build && npm run build_packed && git add -A
scripts.freeze: node node_modules/@maplat/core/bin/freezer.js -s parts -f src/freeze_images.js -u src/pointer_images.js && node node_modules/@maplat/core/bin/freezer.js -s locales -f src/freeze_locales.js -i

author: Kohei Otsuka, Code for History
